docstring.short_description: Take an S3 key name, S3 bucket name, and file name as input, then extract the file from the specified bucket.

parameters.name: s3_name
parameters.description: name of the key that the user used to save the access and secret access keys

parameters.name: bucket_name
parameters.description: Amazon S3 bucket name that they are trying to access

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: name of the file that they want to extract

returns.description: DataFrame loaded from file in the specfied bucket
